sentence: House Minority Leader Reginald Bolding, D-Phoenix, predicted that if his Republican colleagues got the power to reject election results, they’d do so based simply on which results they liked or didn’t like.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Newest Arizona GOP election proposal would allow lawmakers to reject election results

sentence: House Minority Leader Reginald Bolding, D-Phoenix, said the Republicans can pass whatever they want with a simple majority, but he wouldn’t commit to supporting the plan.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Failing to read a bill has thrown the Arizona GOP into chaos

sentence: Minority leader Reginald Bolding, D-Phoenix, also described the measure as government overreach.
author: Gloria Gomez
title: Arizona GOP lawmakers send Ducey bills banning gender surgery, girls’ sports for trans kids
